p: Knowing that the LED street lamp consumes about 60 watt in an hour and about 780 watt through the 13 hours of evening and night intervals from (6 pm to 7 am) according to the Egyptian Environmental law 4/94. And the regular Halogen lamps consumes about 150 watt in an hour and about 1950 watt through the 13 hours of evening and night intervals. Calculating the number of street lamps that can be lit using the converted electric energy would be calculated by dividing the total amount of energy produced to the amount of energy consumed by one street lamp of any type.
